name: Western Town
description:
A short game made in one semester by a team of 7 (1x programmer, 2 graphic designers, 2x musicians/sfx, 1x dialogs and storytelling, 1x game mechanics).

The game is set in a western town and player as a protagonist is brought to justice by local Sheriff. You have an opportunity to help defend the town from bandit attacks and in return, gain freedom from the jail you are in.
